div.p:
Let me thank you, dear Mr Moule, for your prompt attention to the wishes of the Trustees, to advise them professionally in reference to the financial irregularities in Lissignol's administration of the Royal Park.
get details from minutes.
I will place your legal report before my colleagues at an early meeting probably to be held already on Friday next.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
